title: Mandy Patinkin Talks Homeland, Syrian Refugees, and Anne Frank
description: The actor behind Homeland's Saul Berenson joins Chuck to talk about the inspiration behind the character, and his work advocating on behalf of Syrian refugees.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
